summary: The 2028 Summer Olympics, called LA28, will be in Los Angeles, U.S., from July 14-30. It's the third time L.A. hosts the Games, making it the first non-European city to do so three times. New sports like skateboarding and surfing will be joined by flag football, squash, baseball/softball, cricket, and lacrosse. Boxing, modern pentathlon, and weightlifting might not be included due to problems with their governing bodies.
title: 2028 Summer Olympics
